item.description: Follow the journey in Episode 7 as a retirement home takes shape. What feature would you add to yours?

item.title: Concrete Footings Made Simple
item.description: See how to set strong concrete footings that support lasting builds. What structure would you start with?

item.title: Easy Window Installation Guide
item.description: Learn step‑by‑step how to install a window with confidence. Could this be your next DIY project?

item.title: Sealing leaks in our new woodworking shop
item.description: Setting up the Perkins woodworking shop at a new location and tracking down leaks in the dust collection system. How do small fixes make a big difference in shop efficiency?If you’re a pro, try it for free using the link in buildersRX bio! @sashcoinc @buildersrx

item.title: Episode 6: Building a dream retirement home
item.description: Progress continues on a dream retirement home as key construction phases come together. What milestones define this stage of the build?

item.title: Precision meets power in a mega-sized project
item.description: A look at a massive build where careful planning, exact measurements, and powerful machinery come together. How do precision and scale work hand in hand on big projects?

item.title: Quick & easy block laying techniques
item.description: Step-by-step methods for laying blocks efficiently while keeping accuracy and strength in mind. How can simple techniques speed up construction without cutting corners?

item.title: The three magic layout numbers
item.description: Explaining three key measurements that help keep house layout accurate and prevent costly framing and foundation mistakes. How can simple numbers save time and money?

item.title: Mega vision. Mega materials. Mega results.
item.description: A look at how big ideas and high-quality materials come together to deliver standout results on a major build. Why does scale change everything?

item.title: Top 3 tips for block work
item.description: Practical builder advice covering three key tips for clean, strong block work. What small details make the biggest difference on site?

item.title: Setting grade pegs for level footings
item.description: A clear approach to setting grade pegs accurately to ensure footings stay level and square. Why is this step critical before pouring concrete?

item.title: Installing roofing step by step
item.description: Walking through the roofing installation process, from layout to final placement, with practical tips from the field. What mistakes should be avoided?

item.title: Starting the Nantahala build
item.description: Kicking off the Nantahala home build by orienting for views, laying footings, and sharing early planning tips. Why does site layout matter so much at the start?

item.title: Making concrete pours easier
item.description: Breaking down methods and preparation steps that simplify concrete pouring and reduce stress on build day. What details make the biggest difference?

item.title: My saw journey and Jaime’s advice
item.description: Sharing lessons learned from years of working with saws and the advice from Jaime that changed how tools are chosen and used. What advice stuck the most?

item.title: Unexpected uses for a speed square
item.description: Exploring creative and lesser-known ways a speed square can be used on the job site beyond basic layout. Which trick would you actually use?

item.title: Snowfall slows the farmhouse build
item.description: An unexpected snowstorm hits the job site during Day 29 of the farmhouse build, adding challenges and adjustments to the construction schedule. How does weather change the plan?

item.title: Mastering rafters: cutting and measuring tips
item.description: A hands-on guide to cutting and measuring rafters accurately, breaking down techniques that help improve efficiency and reduce mistakes. What separates clean framing from rework?

item.title: Choosing the right truck for construction work
item.description: A practical comparison of trucks commonly used on construction sites, focusing on capability, durability, and everyday usability. Which features matter most for the job?

item.title: Assembling a giant Nantahala roof
item.description: Watch as the massive roof of a Nantahala home comes together, highlighting planning, teamwork, and precision. How do builders handle roofing of this scale?
